description.english: Complete the chain tutorial in 5 drops in the story mode
description.german: Schließe im Story-Modus die fünfteilige Einführung zu Ketten ab.
description.french: Réussir le tutoriel de chaine en 5 pièces dans le mode histoire
description.italian: Completa il tutorial della catena in 5 pezzi in modalità storia
description.spanish: En el modo historia, completa el tutorial sobre cadenas con 5 piezas.
description.schinese: 在故事模式中用 5 个蛋蛋鬼完成连锁教程
description.japanese: ストーリーモードで5連鎖チュートリアルを完了しよう
description.brazilian: Conclua o tutorial de cadeias em 5 peças no modo história

description.english: Spend 2 minutes in the chain absorption tutorial in the story mode
description.german: Verbringe im Story-Modus 2 Minuten in der Einführung zur Kettenabsorption.
description.french: Passer 2 minutes sur le tuto de chaine d'absorption dans le mode histoire
description.italian: Passa 2 minuti nel tutorial dell’assorbimento a catena in modalità storia
description.spanish: En el modo historia, invierte 2 minutos en el tutorial de absorción de cadenas.
description.schinese: 在故事模式中，在连锁吞噬教程中度过 2 分钟
description.japanese: ストーリーモードで連鎖吸収チュートリアルを2分間しよう
description.brazilian: Passe 2 minutos no tutorial de absorção em cadeia no modo história

displayName.spanish: Toda la carne en el asador

description.english: Beat Barbak at the first encounter in the story mode
description.german: Besiege Barbak bei der ersten Begegnung im Story-Modus.
description.french: Battre Barbak à la première rencontre dans le mode histoire
description.italian: Batti Carnak al primo incontro in modalità storia
description.spanish: En el modo historia, gana a Barbak en vuestro primer encuentro.
description.schinese: 在故事模式的第一次遭遇战中击败巴尔巴克
description.japanese: ストーリーモードでバーベックを最初の遭遇時に倒そう
description.brazilian: Derrote Barbak no primeiro encontro no modo história

description.english: Cook for Barbak using less than 50 danghosts or urns in the story mode
description.german: Koche im Story-Modus für Barbak und verwende dabei weniger als 50 Danghosts oder Urnen.
description.french: Cuisiner pour Barbak en utilisant moins de 50 danghosts ou urnes dans le mode histoire
description.italian: Cucina per Carnak usando meno di 50 danghost o urne in modalità storia
description.spanish: En el modo historia, cocina para Barbak usando menos de 50 danghost o urnas.
description.schinese: 在故事模式中为巴尔巴克做饭时，使用不超过 50 个蛋蛋鬼或者瓮。
description.japanese: ストーリーモードで、ダンゴースト（または壺）を50体以下で、バーベックに料理をつくる
description.brazilian: Cozinhe para Barbak usando menos de 50 danghosts ou urnas no modo história

description.english: Steal the candy and never lose it in the first candy-snatch of the story mode
description.german: Stiehl beim ersten Bonbonraub im Story-Modus das Bonbon und verliere es nicht.
description.french: Voler le bonbon et ne jamais le perdre dans le premier attrape-bonbon du mode histoire
description.italian: Ruba la caramella e non perderla mai nel primo ruba-caramelle in modalità storia
description.spanish: En el modo historia, roba un caramelo y consérvalo en el primer día de Asalto al caramelo.
description.schinese: 在故事模式中的第一场“抢糖果”中偷取糖果，并且没有将其丢掉
description.japanese: キャンディーを盗むと、ストーリーモードの最初のキャンディーつかみで絶対に負けない
description.brazilian: Roube a bala e o não a perca durante o primeiro rouba-doces no modo história

description.english: Solve the final puzzle during Momoni's punishment in the story mode
description.german: Löse im Story-Modus die letzte Puzzleaufgabe während Momonis Bestrafung.
description.french: Résoudre le puzzle final de la punition de Momoni dans le mode histoire
description.italian: Risolvi il rompicapo finale durante la punizione di Momoni in modalità storia
description.spanish: En el modo historia, resuelve el puzle final durante el castigo de Momoni.
description.schinese: 在故事模式中接受嬷嬷妮的惩罚时，解开最后一个谜题
description.japanese: ストーリーモードのモモミ先生のお説教の間に最後のパズルを解く
description.brazilian: Solucione o quebra-cabeça final durante o castigo da Momoni no modo história

description.english: Lose a dangoal match without scoring a single point in the story mode
description.german: Verliere im Story-Modus ein Dangoal-Spiel, ohne einen einzigen Punkt zu erzielen.
description.french: Perdre une partie de dangoal dans le mode histoire sans marquer de points
description.italian: Perdi una partita di dangol senza fare neanche un punto in modalità storia
description.spanish: En el modo historia, pierde un partido de dangol sin marcar un solo gol.
description.schinese: 在故事模式输掉一场蛋蛋赛且一分未得
description.japanese: ストーリーモードで一点も取らずにダンゴールのゲームで負ける
description.brazilian: Perca uma partida de dangol sem marcar nenhum ponto no modo história

displayName.italian: Il potere ti ha dato alla testa

description.english: Launch your power 15 times during the boss fight of arc 4
description.german: Setze deine Kraft während des Bosskampfs von Teil 4 15 Mal ein.
description.french: Lancer 15 fois son pouvoir lors du boss de l'arc 4
description.italian: Usa il tuo potere 15 volte durante il combattimento con il boss della parte 4
description.spanish: Activa tu poder 15 veces en la batalla contra el jefe final del arco 4.
description.schinese: 在第 4 幕的头目战中使用你的能力 15 次
description.japanese: 第4話のボスとの戦闘で力を15回以上、力を発揮
description.brazilian: Lance seu poder 15 vezes durante a luta contra o chefe do arco 4

displayName.italian: Meglio di così non si può

description.english: Absorb all 4 of Ashak's super creatures in a single chain combo in the story mode
description.german: Absorbiere im Versus-Modus Ashaks 4 Superkreaturen mit einer einzigen Kettenkombo.
description.french: Absorber 4 super créatures d'Ashak en un seul combo de chaines dans le mode histoire
description.italian: Assorbi tutte le 4 super creature di Ashak con una sola combo a catena in modalità storia
description.spanish: En el modo historia, absorbe los 4 monstruitos de Ashak en un solo combo en cadena.
description.schinese: 在故事模式中，以一次连锁连击吞噬阿沙克的全部 4 个超级生物
description.japanese: ストーリーモードでサトックのスーパークリーチャー4体をすべて連鎖1回で吸収する
description.brazilian: Absorva todas as 4 supercriaturas de Ashak em um único combo em cadeia no modo versus

description.english: Beat B-T-BOO without getting lasered by drones
description.german: Besiege B-T-BOO, ohne von den Laserstrahlen der Drohnen getroffen zu werden.
description.french: Vaincre B-T-BOO sans se faire tirer dessus par un drone
description.italian: Sconfiggi B-T-BOO senza farti colpire dai laser dei droni
description.spanish: Vence a B-T-BOO sin que te den los drones.
description.schinese: 在不被无人机激光击中的情况下打败比特波
description.japanese: ドローンのレーザーに当たらずにB-T-BOOを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote B-T-BOO sem sofrer dano dos lasers dos drones

description.english: Beat the final boss without getting any help by your allies
description.german: Besiege den letzten Boss ohne jede Hilfe von deinen Verbündeten.
description.french: Vaincre le boss final sans se faire aider par des alliés
description.italian: Sconfiggi il boss finale senza ricevere aiuto dai tuoi alleati
description.spanish: Vence al jefe final sin ayuda de tus aliados.
description.schinese: 在没有得到任何盟友帮助的情况下打败最后头目
description.japanese: 最後のボスを仲間の助けを借りずに倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote o último chefe sem receber nenhuma ajuda dos seus aliados

description.english: Win all Arc 1 duels without dropping any danghost or using powers
description.german: Gewinne alle Duelle von Teil 1, ohne einen Danghost zu platzieren oder Kräfte einzusetzen.
description.french: Gagner tous les duels de l'arc 1 sans poser de danghost ni utiliser de pouvoirs
description.italian: Vinci tutti i duelli della Parte 1 senza posizionare danghost e senza usare i poteri
description.spanish: Gana todos los duelos del arco 1 sin colocar danghost ni usar tus poderes.
description.schinese: 在没有落下任何蛋蛋鬼，且不使用能力的情况下赢得第 1 幕的所有对决
description.japanese: 第1話の決闘を、ダンゴーストを1つも落とさず、力も使わずに、すべて勝つ
description.brazilian: Vença todos os duelos do Arco 1 sem colocar nenhum danghost nem usar poderes

description.english: Beat all fights of the story mode without placing danghosts or using powers (when possible)
description.german: Gewinne im Story-Modus alle Kämpfe, ohne Danghosts zu platzieren oder Kräfte einzusetzen (soweit möglich).
description.french: Gagner tous les duels du mode histoire sans poser de danghost ni utiliser de pouvoirs (si possible)
description.italian: Vinci tutti i duelli della modalità storia senza posizionare danghost e senza usare i poteri (quando possibile)
description.spanish: Gana todas las batallas del modo historia sin colocar danghost o usar poderes (cuando sea posible).
description.schinese: 在故事模式中赢得所有战斗，且不放置蛋蛋鬼，也不使用能力（如有可能）
description.japanese: ストーリーモードの戦いをすべて、（使う必要のない時に）ダンゴーストや力を使わずに勝つ
description.brazilian: Vença todas as lutas do modo história sem colocar danghosts nem usar poderes (quando possível)

description.english: Complete all arc 1 puzzles with a single-chain combo (no placement after the first absorption)
description.german: Schließe alle Puzzleaufgaben von Teil 1 mit einer einzigen Kettenkombo ab (keine Platzierung nach der ersten Absorption).
description.french: Réussir tous les puzzles de l'arc 1 en un seul combo de chaines (sans placer après la première absorption)
description.italian: Completa tutti i rompicapo della Parte 1 con una sola combo a catena (senza posizionare nulla dopo il primo assorbimento)
description.spanish: Completa todos los puzles del arco 1 con un solo combo en cadena (sin colocar nada tras la primera absorción).
description.schinese: 用一次单次连锁连击完成第 1 幕的所有谜题（在第一次吞噬后不能放置）
description.japanese: 第1話のすべてのパズルを、1つの連鎖で（最初の吸収のあとに何もしないで）完了させる
description.brazilian: Conclua todos os quebra-cabeças do arco 1 com um único combo em cadeia (sem colocar nada após a primeira absorção)

description.english: Succeed all arc 1 survivals without dropping any danghost, using powers or reaching the roof of the altar
description.german: Bewältige alle Überlebensaufgaben von Teil 1, ohne einen Danghost zu platzieren, Kräfte einzusetzen oder das Dach des Altars zu erreichen.
description.french: Réussir toutes les survies de l'arc 1 sans poser de danghost ni utiliser de pouvoirs ni toucher le haut de l'autel
description.italian: Supera le prove di sopravvivenza della Parte 1 senza posizionare danghost, usare i poteri o raggiungere il tetto dell’altare
description.spanish: Aguanta las supervivencias del arco 1 sin colocar danghost, usar tus poderes o alcanzar el techo del altar.
description.schinese: 在没有落下任何蛋蛋鬼，且不使用能力，以及不碰触祭坛顶部的情况下通过第 1 幕的生存模式
description.japanese: 第1話のサバイバルを、ダンゴーストを1体も落とさず、力も使わず、ほこらの屋根に達する前に、すべてクリアする
description.brazilian: Vença todos os desafios de sobrevivência do arco 1 sem colocar nenhum danghost, usar poderes nem chegar ao teto do altar

description.english: Succeed all arc 2 survivals without dropping any danghost, using powers or reaching the roof of the altar

description.english: Get a combo marked "COOL" in normal difficulty or higher in versus mode
description.german: Löse im Kampfmodus auf „Normal“ oder einer höheren Schwierigkeit eine mit „COOL“ bewertete Kombo aus.
description.french: Obtenir un combo noté au moins  "COOL" en difficulté normal ou plus en mode versus
description.italian: Ottieni una combo "COOL" a difficoltà normale o superiore in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, consigue un combo «COOL» en dificultad normal o superior.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中，以普通或更高难度获得一个"COOL"级连击
description.japanese: 対戦モードのノーマル以上の難易度で「COOL」のコンボを出す
description.brazilian: Faça um combo do tipo "COOL" na dificuldade normal ou maior no modo versus

description.english: Explode on an altar while being in astral body in the versus mode
description.german: Lass deinen Astralkörper im Kampfmodus auf einem Altar explodieren.
description.french: Exploser sur un autel en forme astrale en mode versus
description.italian: Esplodi su un altare mentre sei in forma astrale in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, explota en un altar estando en tu forma astral.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中以星之体形态在一个祭坛上爆炸
description.japanese: 対戦モードで霊体になってほこらの上で爆発を起こす
description.brazilian: Exploda em um altar enquanto estiver em corpo astral no modo versus

displayName.italian: Le urne non sono mai troppe
displayName.japanese: 壺が多すぎることはない

description.english: Have 30 urns on a player altar in the versus mode
description.german: Platziere im Kampfmodus 30 Urnen auf dem Altar eines Spielers.
description.french: Avoir 30 urnes sur son autel en mode versus
description.italian: Posiziona 30 urne sull’altare di un giocatore nella modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, ten 30 urnas en tu altar.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中，在一个玩家的祭坛上放置 30 个瓮
description.japanese: 対戦モードでプレイヤーのほこらに壺が30個ある状態にする
description.brazilian: Tenha 30 urnas em um altar de jogador no modo versus

description.english: Change 50 times the background in the character selection screen
description.german: Ändere bei der Charakterauswahl 50 Mal den Hintergrund.
description.french: Changer 50 fois de fond en selection de personnage
description.italian: Cambia lo sfondo 50 volte nella schermata di selezione del personaggio
description.spanish: Cambia 50 veces el fondo en la pantalla de selección de personaje.
description.schinese: 在角色选择界面改变背景 50 次
description.japanese: キャラクター選択画面で50回背景を変える
description.brazilian: Troque o plano de fundo 50 vezes na tela de seleção de jogador

description.english: Hold 100 pieces in a single game of versus mode
description.german: Lagere im Kampfmodus in einer einzigen Partie 100 Teile.
description.french: Faire 100 stockages en une seule partie du mode versus
description.italian: Conserva 100 pezzi in una sola partita in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, reserva 100 piezas en una sola partida.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中保留 100 个蛋蛋鬼
description.japanese: 対戦モードのゲーム1回で100ピース保持する
description.brazilian: Reserve 100 peças em uma única partida no modo versus

description.english: Absorb 30 danghosts with a single urn in versus mode
description.german: Absorbiere im Kampfmodus mit einer einzigen Urne 30 Danghosts.
description.french: Absorber 30 danghosts avec une seule urne en mode versus
description.italian: Assorbi 30 danghost con una sola urna in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, absorbe 30 danghost con una sola urna.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中用一个瓮吞噬 30 个蛋蛋鬼
description.japanese: 対戦モードで、壺1つでダンゴーストを30体、吸収する
description.brazilian: Absorva 30 danghosts com uma única urna no modo versus

displayName.japanese: カオスのエージェント

description.english: Stay alive 3 minutes in apocalypse difficulty in versus mode
description.german: Bleibe im Kampfmodus auf der Schwierigskeitsstufe „Apokalypse“ 3 Minuten am Leben.
description.french: Tenir 3 minutes en difficulté apocalypse en mode versus
description.italian: Rimani in vita per 3 minuti con difficoltà apocalisse in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, aguanta 3 minutos en dificultad apocalipsis.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中的启示录难度下存活 3 分钟
description.japanese: 対戦モードのアポカリプス難易度で3分間生き延びる
description.brazilian: Fique vivo por 3 minutos na dificuldade apocalipse no modo versus

description.english: Hold a Kukupin's stone in versus mode
description.german: Lagere im Kampfmodus einen von Kukupins Steinen.
description.french: Stocker un caillou de Kukupin en mode versus
description.italian: Conserva una pietra di Kokopan in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, reserva una piedra de Kukupin.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中保留一个库库平之石
description.japanese: 対戦モードでフフパンの石をつかむ
description.brazilian: Reserve uma pedra de Kukupin no modo versus

description.english: Throw all the pieces of a player in Barbak's fire with Momoni's power in versus mode
description.german: Befördere im Kampfmodus mit Momonis Kraft alle Teile eines Spielers in Barbaks Feuer.
description.french: Envoyer toutes les pièces d'un joueur dans le feu de Barbak avec le pouvoir de Momoni en mode versus
description.italian: Lancia tutti i pezzi di un giocatore nel fuoco di Carnak con il potere di Momoni in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, lanza todas las piezas de un jugador al fuego de Barbak con el poder de Momoni.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中，用嬷嬷妮的能力将一位玩家的所有蛋蛋鬼扔进巴尔巴克的火焰中
description.japanese: 対戦モードでモモミの力を使い、プレイヤーのピースをすべてバーベックの火に入れる
description.brazilian: Jogue todas as peças de um jogador na fogueira do Barbak com o poder da Momoni no modo versus

description.english: Destroy a chimera instead of capturing it in the versus mode
description.german: Zerstöre im Kampfmodus eine Chimäre, statt sie zu fangen.
description.french: Détruire une chimère au lieu de l'absorber en mode versus
description.italian: Distruggi una chimera invece di catturarla in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, destruye una quimera en vez de atraparla.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中摧毁一个缝合怪，而不是将其捕捉
description.japanese: 対戦モードで、キメラをつかまえずに消滅させる
description.brazilian: Destrua uma quimera em vez de capturá-la no modo versus

description.english: Shield an Ashak monster in versus mode
description.german: Schütze im Kampfmodus eines von Ashaks Monstern.
description.french: Mettre un bouclier sur un monstre d'Ashak en mode versus
description.italian: Applica uno scudo a un mostro di Ashak in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, blinda a un monstruito de Ashak.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中保护一个阿沙克的怪兽
description.japanese: ストーリーモードでサトックモンスターにシールドをかぶせる
description.brazilian: Proteja um monstro do Ashak no modo versus

description.english: Make a danghost bridge with Kushinak's power in versus mode
description.german: Erstelle im Kampfmodus mit Kushinaks Kraft eine Danghost-Brücke.
description.french: Faire un pont de danghosts avec le pouvoir de Kushinak en mode versus
description.italian: Crea un ponte di danghost con il potere di Kushinak in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, crea un puente de danghost con el poder de Kushinak.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中，用库什纳克的能力搭起一座蛋蛋鬼之桥
description.japanese: 対戦モードでクチサックの力を使ってダンゴーストの橋をつくる
description.brazilian: Faça uma ponte de danghosts com o poder de Kushinak no modo versus

description.english: Come back to life in versus mode
description.german: Erwache im Kampfmodus wieder zum Leben.
description.french: Revenir à la vie en mode versus
description.italian: Torna in vita in modalità sfida
description.spanish: En el modo versus, vuelve a la vida.
description.schinese: 在对战模式中复活
description.japanese: 対戦モードで生き返る
description.brazilian: Volte à vida no modo versus
